about.title: Kaprizo is...
about.text: This mobile app allows users to choose vouchers from various stores and send them as gifts to their loved ones. We make gifting easy, fast, and modern!

fast_and_easy.title: Fast & Easy Purchase
fast_and_easy.text: Select and send vouchers in just a few simple steps

wide_selection.title: Wide Selection
wide_selection.text: Vouchers from top stores and brands — all in one app

immediate_delivery.title: Instant Delivery
immediate_delivery.text: Vouchers are delivered instantly via SMS or email

for_any_event.title: Perfect for Any Occasion
for_any_event.text: Birthday, wedding, or holiday — always a perfect gift

secure_payment_system.title: Secure Payment System
secure_payment_system.text: Your data is protected, and payments are safe

make_loved_happy.title: Delight Your Loved Ones
make_loved_happy.text: Spread joy with a gift – it’s simple with the app!

purchases_saved_history.title: Purchase History Saved
purchases_saved_history.text: What, when, and to whom — everything saved in your history

one.question: How can I purchase a voucher?
one.answer: Open the app, select a voucher, register, and complete your purchase with secure payment

two.question: Where is the voucher delivered?
two.answer: The voucher is delivered to the provided email address or phone number

three.question: Is the payment secure?
three.answer: Yes, all payments are encrypted and processed through a secure system

four.question: Can I buy a voucher without registration??
four.answer: No, a quick registration is required to complete the purchase

five.question: What is the voucher’s validity period?
five.answer: The validity period depends on the voucher — details are provided on the voucher itself.

select_app.title: Choose a voucher
select_app.text: Browse through our store selection and pick the perfect voucher for yourself or a loved one

register_app.title: Register in the app
register_app.text: Fill in your details and sign up to unlock the full functionality of the app

open_app.title: Make the payment
open_app.text: Confirm your purchase and pay securely through our trusted payment system

delivered_voucher.title: Receive the voucher
delivered_voucher.text: Your selected voucher will be instantly delivered to the provided address
